short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A utility to trace Kinetic Web UX BO Calls on the Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a developer tool for tracing and recording web requests made within Epicor Kinetic. This can be used to determine the sequence of calls (and properties) that need to be modified to invoke an Epicor Business Object Correctly.

Please note that this extension should only be enabled while being used since it will affect the performance of your application(s).
